title: 451. Can I Ask You a Ridiculously Personal Question?
description: Most of us are are afraid to ask sensitive questions about money, sex, politics, etc. New research shows this fear is largely unfounded. Time for some interesting conversations!
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
